name: International Conference on Recent Challenges in Engineering and Technology
content: IFERP with high responsibility and expectation organizes virtual conference International Conference on Recent Challenges in Engineering and Technology (ICRCET - 2020) which is scheduled to take place on the 30th – 31st October, 2020 Advantages Comfort Zone: Without travel, Participate brain storming speeches and present your Nobel ideas from your comfort zone. Environmental and Health Minimized: Virtual conference bring world near to you buy minimizing the risk factors involved in health and safety. Flexibility: Provides complete freedom and able to choose preferred sessions. Global reachability: Activities and presentation will be broadcasted to mass audiences globally. Productive memory: Recording of discussions, events and presentations can be held for future development. Appreciation: Awards and reorganization’s will be given for best performance. Publication: Accepted abstracts can be published in proceedings and chance to publish in Scopus indexed journals based on author preference. Early bird Registration: 30th August 2020 Abstract Submission: 10th September 2020 Full Paper Submission: 30th September 2020 Final Registration: 05th October 2020 Contact us Program Manager : Vigineshwar Phone Number : +91 9150770323 Email Address : info@icrcet.org
